description: Basic company identification and registration details (name, incorporation date, registration number, legal form, jurisdiction, address, ownership structure).
topic: i want to make a very clear detailed conpamy report

questions.question: What is the exact name of the company as per official records?
When was the company initially incorporated or registered?
What is the unique registration number assigned to the company?
What is the legal form or structure of the company, e.g., private limited, public company, etc.?
In what jurisdiction is the company registered or incorporated?
